Transcription for 996881

In your eternal living, set up days,
Till we temple and we be there,
Each to reach the heart that gives.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
Unto thee, King of the heavens,
Holy, Holy, Holy Lord.
And in thy heart there are hands,
With the river, ocean, and sea.
There to our love and your name that,
Thou didst call thy heart with me.
Thou didst hear thy call from the heavens,
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
Holy, Holy, Holy Lord.
Here together we are all one,
You will be with us forever.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
For my glory will forever,
Work is where my heart will score.
